survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction levels with AI-powered customer service solutions across various industries.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer service tools (e.g., chatbots, virtual assistants)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for frequency to capture a broad range of user interactions.

script.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer service tools (e.g., chatbots, virtual assistants)?

questions.question_text: Which industries have you used AI-powered customer service tools in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option for comprehensiveness.

script.question_text: Which industries have you used AI-powered customer service tools in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using AI-powered customer service tools?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected anything other than 'Never' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique motivations.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with 'Other' open-text option (SINGLE_CHOICE with conditional open text)
